trans-unit.source: Identifies a type as an object suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object.
This class cannot be inherited.
Use the DataObjectAttribute attribute to identify an object as suitable for use by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.

Design-time classes such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class use the DataObjectAttribute attribute to present suitable objects to bind to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property is set to `true` when you use the DataObjectAttribute constructor.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref> class and indicates whether an object is suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object.

Use the DataObjectAttribute constructor to indicate to a design-time class such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class that an object should be excluded from the list of suitable objects for binding to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property is set to the value of the `isDataObject` parameter.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates that the class is suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object at design time.
This field is read-only.
The DataObject field returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> object with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property set to `true`.
To be added.

Represents the default value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref> class, which indicates that the class is suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object at design time.
This field is read-only.

The Default field defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> class initialized with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor, which sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property to `true`.
To be added.
Determines whether this instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref> fits the pattern of another object.
This method determines whether this instance of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> fits the pattern of another object.
An object to compare with this instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref>.
if this instance is the same as the instance specified by the obj parameter; otherwise, .
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Gets a value indicating whether an object should be considered suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object at design time.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object should be considered suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current value of the attribute is the default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates that the class is not suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object at design time.
This field is read-only.
The NonDataObject field returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> object with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property set to `false`.
To be added.
